title: (12) - Outcoming - A problem redone.
Twelve Points On Two Orbits
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/uploads/LFLy9sCk6a-steinerinellipsetrisect.png?width=1200"}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A triangle has vertices "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A=(0,0), B=(24,0), C=(6,12)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". The equation of its Steiner inellipse has the form:
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a{ y }^{ 2 }+bxy+{ cx }^{ 2 }+dy+ex+f=0"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"where "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a, b, c, d, e, f"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are co-prime integers with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a>0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The equation of another ellipse that trisects all three sides of triangle "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"ABC"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" has the equation: "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a{ y }^{ 2 }+bxy+{ cx }^{ 2 }+dy+ex+f_2=0"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"where "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a, b, c, d, e, f_2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are co-prime integers, and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a>0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\dfrac{f}{f_2}=\dfrac{m}{n}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", where  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m,n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are coprime positive integers, find "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m + n."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"heading","attrs":[{"level":6}],"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The problem is original"}]}]}

Ellipses have equations:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"4x² + 13y² + 4x y - 96x - 144y + 512 = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{f}{f_2}=\frac{8}{9}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

title: 1 = 2 Proof
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"What step is incorrect?"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Step 1: Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" = "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"B"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Step 2: Then "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" = "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"B^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Step 3: "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" + "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" = "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" + "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"AB"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Step 4: "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2A^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" = "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" + "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"AB"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Step 5: "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2A^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" - "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2AB"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" = "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" + "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"AB"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" - "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2AB"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Step 6: and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2A^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" - "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2AB"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" = "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" - "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"AB"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Step 7: This can be written as "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2(A^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" - "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"AB)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" = "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1(A^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" - "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"AB)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Step 8: and cancelling the "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(A^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" - "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"AB)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" from both sides gives 1 = 2"}]}]}
